name: Two Wishes
description:

Welcome to Two Wishes! To continue following game updates, enter our Discord server.

Discord of Two Wishes!

Two Wishes is a 3D platform, inspired by the classics of the industry, which tells the story of Ma and At, two opposite beings who wake up on a mysterious island with no memories of how they got there. Inexplicably At is trapped inside Ma's body and now they need to find a way to separate themselves.

The player will be able to switch between the personalities in the control of the body, changing the abilities of the characters, the way they interact with the scenery and mainly the way they see the world, allowing levels that combine exploration, observation and mechanics that allow multiple ways of overcoming challenges.

The rules of the game are taught within the prototype itself.
